nodes.text: Bodyguards were responsible for the protection of individuals. Often they were a part of a military or security force. Organizations that served as bodyguards included the Emperor's Royal Guard, the Senate Guard, the Elite Praetorian Guard, the Royal Naboo Security Forces, the Mandalorian Protectors, the Coruscant Guard, and the Geonosian royal guard. IG-100 MagnaGuards served as droid bodyguards for members of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, most notably General Grievous.
